name: ELyrics | Ad removal - Site Center Fix
description: removes ads, makes lyrics readable and centers site
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);
@-moz-document domain("elyrics.net") {a[target="_blank"], table[style="border: 1px solid rgb(150, 156, 134);"], #gad {display:none!important} table {margin:auto !important} DIV[style="font-size: 12px; padding-left: 4px; color: rgb(160, 82, 45);"] {color:#009900 !important;font-weight:bold !important;text-align:center !important;font-size:18px !important;} strong {font-size:35px !important;text-decoration:underline !important;display:block !important;padding-bottom:15px !important} table[bgcolor="#b8bcad"] {background:white !important;}}
